data.title: How Hollywood Mogul Arnon Milchan Uses His Benjamins to Influence Israeli Politics
data.meta_description: The Israeli-born Billionaire Has Been Close to Politicians in Israel for Years, but He Doesn’t Throw Presents Around – Except of Course the Cigars and Champagne Demanded by the Prime Minister.
